revised_title: Determination of the Difference in the Number of Vibrations Made by an Invariable Pendulum in Royal Observatories
tldr: The author, Edward Sabine, conducts experiments to determine the difference in the number of vibrations made by an invariable pendulum at the Royal Observatories of Greenwich and Altona. The study involves comparing the rate of the pendulum at both locations and considering the effects of temperature and barometer readings on the results.
